statements: UPSERT INTO orders (KEY, VALUE, OPTIONS) VALUES ('ttlk02', {'a': 'ttlk02'}, {'expiration': 3000000000})
UPSERT INTO orders VALUES ('ttlk11', {'a': 'ttlk11'}) RETURNING META().expiration
UPSERT INTO orders VALUES ('ttlk12', {'a': 'ttlk12'}, {'expiration': 3.1*1000*1000*1000}) RETURNING META().expiration
UPSERT INTO orders (KEY id, VALUE doc)  SELECT CONCAT(META(o).id,'-',o.a) AS id, o AS doc FROM orders AS o USE KEYS 'ttlk01'
UPSERT INTO orders (KEY id, VALUE doc, OPTIONS {expiration})  SELECT CONCAT(META(o).id,'-',o.a) AS id, o AS doc, META(o).expiration FROM orders AS o USE KEYS 'ttlk02'
UPSERT INTO orders (KEY id)  SELECT CONCAT(META(o).id,'-',o.a) AS id FROM orders AS o USE KEYS 'ttlk11'
UPSERT INTO orders (KEY id, OPTIONS {expiration})  SELECT CONCAT(META(o).id,'-',o.a) AS id, META(o).expiration FROM orders AS o USE KEYS 'ttlk12'

SELECT META(o).id, META(o).expiration FROM orders AS o USE KEYS ['ttlk01','ttlk01-ttlk01','ttlk02','ttlk02-ttlk02', 'ttlk11', 'ttlk11-ttlk11', 'ttlk12', 'ttlk12-ttlk12', 'ttlk21', 'ttlk22'] ORDER BY META(o).id
